kv7.4:6.4: Dānaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?
kv7.4:6.7: nanu dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv7.4:6.9: Hañci dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.4:7.1: ☒ Dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, cīvaraṃ dānanti?
kv7.4:7.3: Cīvaraṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv7.4:7.6: dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, piṇḍapāto senāsanaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro dānanti?
kv7.4:7.8: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
kv7.4:11.5: “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:11.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti.
kv7.4:11.8: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti averaṃ deti abyābajjhaṃ deti.
kv7.4:11.9: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā averaṃ datvā abyābajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
kv7.4:11.10: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ aggaññaṃ rattaññaṃ vaṃsaññaṃ porāṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇapubbaṃ, na saṃkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṃ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:11.11: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako adinnādānaṃ pahāya … pe …
kv7.4:11.18: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti averaṃ deti abyābajjhaṃ deti.
kv7.4:11.19: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā averaṃ datvā abyābajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
kv7.4:11.20: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ aggaññaṃ rattaññaṃ vaṃsaññaṃ porāṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇapubbaṃ, na saṃkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṃ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:11.21: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
kv7.4:12.5: “idhekacco annaṃ deti, pānaṃ deti, vatthaṃ deti, yānaṃ deti, mālaṃ deti, gandhaṃ deti, vilepanaṃ deti, seyyaṃ deti, āvasathaṃ deti, padīpeyyaṃ detī”ti.
